42688573341883.name: Chocolate Caramel Squares Candy - 5lb Bulk
42688573341883.desc: We love that these Chocolate Caramel Squares Candies come wrapped in cellophane so we can see right through to the deliciousness! And why would anyone want to cover up a candy that features a delicious milk chocolate square of amazingness and a melty, chewy caramel center inside?Are you a major proponent for Chocolate Caramel Square Candies? Then you've hit the jackpot here on CandyStore. com because we have tehm in bulk at budget friendly prices. This means you can bring home hundreds of these Chocolate Caramel Square Candies to chow down on for weeks to come. Or however long your sweet tooth allows.

42688999784635.name: Chocolate Malted Milk Balls - 10lb Bulk
42688999784635.desc: Creamy milk chocolate coats these malted milk balls. Classic malt balls are a snack that has turned out to have great longevity over the years. Covered with milk chocolate these malt balls are great by them selves or in a candy mix. Bulk milk chocolate malted milk balls.

42688417333435.name: Hershey's Kisses - 4lb
42688417333435.desc: Show some love with our bulk Hershey kisses! Few candies are as recognizable as the familiar cone shape that is the trademark of these chocolate treats. They are simply yet extremely versatile. Hand them out at parties, use them to fill your candy dish at home or add them to party or wedding favors. No matter where you are or what the occasion may be, guests will savor the sweet taste and unique shape that has earned these charming confections enormous popularity. Every Hershey kiss candy is covered in a silver foil wrapper. Simply peel back the top and enjoy the full, rich flavor that comes with every dainty bite! Our bulk candy packages are the most convenient way to order your Hershey kisses in large quantities for gatherings and events. You can also purchase a pack or two for baking around the holidays so you always have enough to make your favorite Hershey cookies!

42726982484155.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Salt Water Taffy - 2.5lb
42726982484155.desc: When you were young there is a very good chance that you would wait patiently for your mom to turn her back, so you could sneak a piece of cookie dough.Now you can enjoy that same amazing flavor you crave in a convenient candy form. This Chocolate Chip Cookie Salt Water Taffy tastes just like the cookies your mom used to make.If you have children, but try not to give them too many baked goods, you can give them one of these yummy treats, and they will be just as satisfied as they would eating a couple cookies. Since this is soft, chewy candy it will last a lot longer than the real thing.Each piece of chocolate chip cookie taffy is individually wrapped. This makes them perfect for gift bags, candy dishes, pinatas, and lunch boxes. Hand these unique treats out at Halloween and have peace-of-mind knowing you are not contributing to potential allergic reactions in kids with gluten, peanut, or tree nut allergies.Chocolate Chip Cookie Salt Water Taffy is a nice representation of the real thing. The creamy white candy coasts deep brown spots to mimic chocolate chips. These certified kosher treats are sure to be loved by anyone you decide to share with.

42726969409723.name: Chocolate Malt Taffy Town Salt Water Taffy - 2.5lb
42726969409723.desc: Wrapped individually in wax paper, colored in gorgeous white and brown taffy and packed with delicious, chocolatey flavor, these Chocolate Malt Salt Water Taffy candies are a decadent treat that everyone will love.Normally salt water taffy is a treat for the summertime, but we're no sticklers for rules around here. We say candy goes any time a sweet tooth strikes, so bring home Chocolate Malt Salt Water Taffy today and enjoy a taste of summer every day of the year. If you know a chocolate and taffy lover who you want to spoil, have a hankering for chocolate yourself, or just would like to try something new, these Chocolate Malt Salt Water Taffy candies are for you!

42688706281659.name: Chocolate Rocks - 5lb
42688706281659.desc: Rocks aren't normally very appetizing, unless they are chocolate rocks! These natural looking candies are absolutely gorgeous to see and so sweet to the taste buds. If you love cocoa flavor, then you will fall in love with these charming little edible pebbles. Each includes a dense chocolate candy that's covered in a solid candy coating in a rainbow of earthy colors!What makes chocolate rocks so delicious isn't just their taste, but also their appearance. Each stone looks just like the real thing! The candy coating creates lovely texture while each chocolate is uniquely shaped √ê just like real rocks. This assortment includes a variety of hues, ranging from slate blue to burnt orange and black. Grab a handful or enjoy one at a time. No matter which color you choose, each offers the same amazing chocolate taste. Our bulk chocolate rocks are a must-have for cake decorating and special occasions!

Each piece starts with a white, purple, pink, or green sugar candy coating followed by a layer of chocolate. Creamy mint filling is hidden deep inside, just waiting to be found! Our bulk Holland mints gives you lots of pieces for weddings and other events!

42688657260731.name: Jumbo Vanilla Marshmallow Chocolates - 5lb
42688657260731.desc: Kids and adults alike love the soft, gooey taste of classic marshmallows. Our jumbo vanilla marshmallow chocolates takes that same famous taste and enhances it with a combination of vanilla and chocolate!Each piece includes a bite-size marshmallow center with a hint of sweet vanilla. The outside is covered in a smooth, satiny layer of delectable chocolate. This one-of-a-kind gourmet candy is available in both dark and milk chocolate varieties. Both offers the same amazingly fluffy texture and taste that makes these confections so irresistible!Our jumbo vanilla marshmallow chocolates are a great way to add to tables at receptions and showers. Put them on a decorative tray or add them to wedding favors so your guests have something sweet to take with them after the festivities!Bulk marshmallow chocolates are the best way to save money and still get a high quality confection that's perfect for any situation, whether you're planning a major event or hanging out at home snacking!
